attributes.action: take steps to end the under age drinking culture by providing free evening and weekend sports and recreational clubs for the under 18's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children of parents living in poverty cannot afford the entrance fees to sports and recreational classes or the travel there and back. They end up wandering the streets looking for things to do and inevitably end up crossing paths with underage drinkers... Free clubs would keep them off the streets and give them an interest, something to work at improving.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
